channel.title: VERY Basic Deleter [Partial GUI;/]
channel.description:
Not very good but yea I did in a few mins, got bored and made it. The .JAR has the .JAVA and .CLASS files, so feel free to edit it.
It has to be in same folder, unless you do somethin like: [code]C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents\MoparScape Servers\lol.txt[/code] I was going to have a console window, but nah, you can see the file is deleted.
[b]No,[/b] this cannot be used for mass-deleting, you'll just have to make a .bat with [b]del *.ext[/b] The JAR is attached. Run it, or extract it, doesn't matter. Forgot to add, but it also has the Compiler and runner if you go to extract it.
[b]Fully tested[/b]

item.title: VERY Basic Deleter [Partial GUI;/]
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

o wow, is that a .bat that uses del *.class or whatever?
read-me.txt, wow a read me, I’ll need that, seriously.
If it’s not made with Java, seriously, that aint fun. With GUI you don’t even need read-me.txt anyway… Just jar it and make a help under somethin… pls

Read full topic

item.title: VERY Basic Deleter [Partial GUI;/]
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Dunno lawl, this was just a small thing I did in a few mins.
Rune Hacker- Extract it with WinRAR or something [the JAR], and the can edit the .java freely, basically all the code is is importing import java.io.File and java.text.*, then doing File wow = new File(“help.txt”); and then doing wow.delete();

Read full topic

jar -xf Deleter.jar

item.title: VERY Basic Deleter [Partial GUI;/]
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Not very good but yea I did in a few mins, got bored and made it.
The .JAR has the .JAVA and .CLASS files, so feel free to edit it.

It has to be in same folder, unless you do somethin like:

C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\My Documents\MoparScape Servers\lol.txt

I was going to have a console window, but nah, you can see the file is deleted.

No, this cannot be used for mass-deleting, you’ll just have to make a .bat with del *.ext
The JAR is attached. Run it, or extract it, doesn’t matter.
Forgot to add, but it also has the Compiler and runner if you go to extract it.

Fully tested

Read full topic
